title: New: Blackbird Blackbird – Calypso
body: [![](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/07/blackbirdblackbird.jpg "blackbirdblackbird")](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/new-blackbird-blackbird-calypso/attachment/blackbirdblackbird/)A new tune from **Blackbird BlackBird** dropped on Wednesday and it’s an entirely darker affair compared with what we’re used to. The synths are deeply layered, with the track containing a more cacophonous sound, thanks to some intricately put together vocal samples that punctuate and highlight the vast open spaces.  For now, **Blackbird Blackbird** are on one hell of a roll. Calypso by Blackbird Blackbird
